channel.title: Need help with a program
channel.description:
It has been a while since I was last on here. Well, I'm in need of some assistance... I run an online site that sells youtube backgrounds, we're doing a new "Create your own" webpage where you will be able to pick and choose from a massive selection of colours, backgrounds, texts, box layouts etc. (See image)
[IMG]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/7077/tubebackgroundscreateur.jpg[/img]
If anyone can help get this to function on a webpage, I would be very thankful, and might even pay you for it!
Thank you so much

item.title: Need help with a program
